metadata.title: CVE-2024-7319 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An incomplete fix for CVE-2023-1625 was found in openstack-heat. Sensitiveinformation may possibly be disclosed through the OpenStack stack abandoncommand with the hidden feature set to True and the CVE-2023-1625 fixapplied.

criterions.comment: heat package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
